Page.Title: Hello, world!
Page.Description: This is a template for a new NextJS project with i18n support.

LoginView.Title: You are not logged in
LoginView.Description: To access groups and see posts, you need an active account.

Description.0: If you think you've seen a ghost, call Ghostbusters

NotFound.Title: Are you lost?
NotFound.Description: The page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

ChooseUsername.Title: Choose a username
ChooseUsername.Description: Staying anonymous is neither fun nor an option. Choose a username to stand out!
ChooseUsername.Label: Username

Errors.Missing: No username was provided in the HTTP request.
Errors.TooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters long.
Errors.InvalidCharacters: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and hyphens.
Errors.InvalidEnding: Username cannot end with a special character.
Errors.InvalidStarting: Username cannot start with a special character.
Errors.Unknown: This username is invalid for an unknown reason.

Following.Title: Following
Following.SelfDescription: You can see these people's posts in your news feed.
Following.OthersDescription: These are all the people {username} follows.

Followers.Title: Followers
Followers.SelfDescription: These people can see your posts in their news feed.
Followers.OthersDescription: These are all the people who follow {username}.

ProfilePage.EditProfileHow: To edit elements, click on them.

Reasons.HARMFUL_CONTENT: This account has been {time} locked for posting harmful content.
Reasons.HARASSMENT: This account has been {time} locked for harassment.
Reasons.IMPERSONATION: This account has been {time} locked for impersonation.
Reasons.SPAM: This account has been {time} locked for spam.
Reasons.INAPPROPRIATE_CONTENT: This account has been {time} locked for posting inappropriate content.
Reasons.MULTIPLE_VIOLATIONS: This account has been {time} locked for multiple community guideline violations.
Reasons.SECURITY_CONCERNS: This account has been {time} locked for security concerns.
Reasons.BANNED_IP: This account has been {time} locked for using a banned IP address.
Reasons.HARMFUL_AUTOMATION: This account has been {time} locked for using harmful automation.
Reasons.FAKE_ENGAGEMENT: This account has been {time} locked for using fake engagement.
Reasons.ILLEGAL_CONTENT: This account has been {time} locked for posting illegal content.
Reasons.UNDERAGE: This account has been {time} locked for being created by an underage person.
Reasons.TRADEMARK_VIOLATION: This account has been {time} locked for trademark violation.
Reasons.COPYRIGHT_VIOLATION: This account has been {time} locked for copyright violation.
Reasons.PLATFORM_MANIPULATION: This account has been {time} locked for platform manipulation.
Reasons.INVESTIGATION_PENDING: This account has been {time} locked pending investigation.

ImageUploadZone.MaxSize: File size must not exceed {size} MB.
ImageUploadZone.Placeholder: Drag and drop or click to upload

BannerProfileDialog.Title: Edit profile banner
BannerProfileDialog.Description: Upload a new image to replace the current profile banner, be creative!
BannerProfileDialog.UploadSuccess: Profile banner has been successfully updated.

AvatarProfileDialog.Title: Edit profile picture
AvatarProfileDialog.Description: Upload a new image to replace the current profile picture, be creative!
AvatarProfileDialog.UploadSuccess: Profile picture has been successfully updated.

TextProfileDialog.Title: Edit your biography
TextProfileDialog.Description: Share a few words about yourself

NameProfileDialog.Title: Edit your display name
NameProfileDialog.Description: Choose the name that other users will see
